Package it.polimi.se2019.view.gui

Class ActionButtons

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.HBox
              • it.polimi.se2019.view.gui.ActionButtons
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class ActionButtons
extends javafx.scene.layout.HBox
    Buttons that allow choosing actions or requesting info during the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionButtons

        ActionButtons​(EventUpdater eventUpdater)
        Create ActionButtons with all the possible player actions. The parameter is the eventUpdater of the corresponding view and its used to send the selected actions.
        Parameters:
        eventUpdater - the eventUpdater of the corresponding view

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        private void onClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Gets the corresponding action from the button. Each button contains the corresponding action name as text.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - event representing the mouse click to select an action

      • clearPossibleActions

        void clearPossibleActions()
        Disables all buttons.

      • setPossibleActions

        void setPossibleActions​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleActions)
        Enables only the buttons corresponding to the actions that the player can currently use.
        Parameters:
        possibleActions - a list of actions that the player can use at the moment

        void enableStop()
